channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2024 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.BarCode for Python via .NET 24.1
item.description: This article contains release notes information for Aspose.BarCode for Python via .NET 24.1. All Changes Key Summary Category BARCODENET-38800 Update QualitySettings API structure Enhancement BARCODENET-38807 Add support of rMQR barcode Enhancement BARCODENET-38868 BarCodeReader could not find DotCode Bug Public API changes and backwards compatibility New types: aspose.barcode.barcoderecognition.XDimensionMode (AUTO/SMALL/NORMAL/LARGE/USE_MINIMAL_X_DIMENSION), aspose.barcode.barcoderecognition.BarcodeQualityMode (HIGH/NORMAL/LOW), aspose.barcode.barcoderecognition.DeconvolutionMode (FAST/NORMAL/SLOW), aspose.barcode.barcoderecognition.InverseImageMode (AUTO/DISABLED/ENABLED), aspose.
